## Testing checklist

### For prompt changes
- [ ] The prompt follows the schema defined in [prompt.schema.json](schema/prompt.schema.json)
- [ ] The prompt includes at least 2-3 examples showing expected inputs and outputs
- [ ] The prompt includes evaluation notes for edge cases and failure modes
- [ ] I have tested the prompt with the recommended models
- [ ] The version has been updated according to semantic versioning guidelines

#### Prompt test results
```
Example input:
[Input text here]

Example output:
[Output text here]
```

## Status and merge options
<!-- Remove the space in the square brackets and put an `x` between the brackets for all the items that apply. -->
- [ ] I [converted my PR to draft](https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests/collaborating-with-pull-requests/proposing-changes-to-your-work-with-pull-requests/changing-the-stage-of-a-pull-request#converting-a-pull-request-to-a-draft) because I'm still working on this PR
- [ ] I [enabled auto-merge (squash)](https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests/collaborating-with-pull-requests/incorporating-changes-from-a-pull-request/automatically-merging-a-pull-request) for my PR
